snapshot.label: Jonli ko‘rsatkichlar
snapshot.caption: Har 60 soniyada yangilanadi va tasdiqlangan to‘lovlar darhol sinxronlanadi.

metric.pendingChange: To‘lovlar 2 ish kuni ichida ko‘rib chiqiladi

create.title: Havolangizni yarating
create.description: Silence AI boshqaruv panelida noyob tavsiya havolasi yoki promo-kod yarating.

share.title: Ulashish
share.description: Jamoalarni email, LinkedIn va hamjamiyatlar orqali taklif qiling. Natijalarni real vaqt rejimida kuzating.

earn.title: Daromad oling
earn.description: Siz tavsiya qilgan mijozlar Silence AI himoyasini yoqqan zahoti komissiya oling.

commission.heading: Balans mukofotlari

reward.title: Har bir balans to‘ldirishga 10% mukofot
reward.description: Taklif qilingan jamoa Silence AI hamyonini to‘ldirganda, sof summaning 10% darhol sizga o‘tkaziladi.

settlement.title: Real vaqt rejimidagi buxgalteriya
settlement.description: Tranzaksiya tugaganidan keyin bir daqiqa ichida mukofotlar hamkor balansiga yoziladi—qo‘lda tasdiqlash navbati yo‘q.

withdrawal.title: Withdrawals processed in 2 business days
withdrawal.description: To‘lovni yechib olish so‘rovlari avtomatik ko‘rib chiqiladi va ikki ish kuni ichida bank hisobingizga yetib boradi.

sample.label: To‘ldirish misollari
sample.caption: Har bir to‘ldirish bilan hamkor daromadi ortadi — darajalarni tiklash yoki mahsulotni moslashtirish shart emas.

commission.note: Komissiya to‘lovni qayta ishlash to‘lovlari chegirib tashlanganidan keyingi sof summadan hisoblanadi.

payments.question: To‘lovlarni qanday olaman?
payments.answer: Profilingizga VISA yoki Mastercard raqamingizni qo‘shing. To‘lovlar ko‘rsatilgan kartaga bevosita o‘tkaziladi.

discounts.question: Taklif qilingan mijozlarga chegirma beriladimi?
discounts.answer: Yo‘q. Taklif qilingan mijozlar xaridlariga chegirma olmaydi; muvaffaqiyatli tavsiyalar uchun komissiyani faqat hamkor oladi.

statistics.question: Tavsiyalar statistikasi qachon ko‘rinadi?
statistics.answer: Foydalanuvchi promo-kod yoki havolangiz orqali ro‘yxatdan o‘tgach, uning elektron pochtasi va tegishli mukofoti panelingizда ko‘rinadi.

hero.headline: AI-SOC 1: Kiberxavfsizlik endi qimmat ham emas, murakkab ham emas
hero.subheading: Barcha qismlarni birlashtirgan, sun’iy intellektga asoslangan kiberxavfsizlik tizimi:

bullets.web: Vaqti-vaqti bilan web hujumlariga qarshi himoya

web.title: Web hujumlariga qarshi himoya
web.content: Tizim barcha turdagi web hujumlaridan (DDoS, SQLi va boshqalar) himoya qiladi, biznes mantiqi zaifliklaridan tashqari

email.title: Email hujumlariga qarshi himoya
email.content: Tizim fishing, zararli ilova, xavfli havolalar kabi barcha email hujumlaridan himoya qiladi

vulnerability.title: Zaifliklarni aniqlash
vulnerability.content: Tizim ilova kodidagi zaifliklarni va sayt/API bilan dinamik o‘zaro ta’sir orqali, intellektual tizim yordamida topadi

cookie.title: Texnik cookie-lar haqida ogohlantirish
cookie.description: Bu sayt faqat til tanlovingizni eslab qolish va keyingi tashrifingizda ushbu ogohlantirishni ko‘rsatmaslik uchun biz o‘rnatgan texnik birinchi tomon cookie-laridan foydalanadi. Kuzatuvchi yoki uchinchi tomon cookie-lari ishlatilmaydi.

cmcGlobal.title: CMС va global trafik monitoringi
cmcGlobal.content: Markazlashtirilgan boshqaruv konsoli (CMC) boshqa xavfsizlik tizimlari bilan integratsiyalashgan bo‘lib, Global Shield va Security Tester bilan bir xil domen va interfeysdan foydalanadi. Bu yerda siz mamlakatlarni blokirovka qilishingiz, portlarni yopishingiz va boshqa amallarni bajarishingiz mumkin

countryBlacklisting.title: Mamlakatni bloklash
countryBlacklisting.content: Muayyan mamlakatdan kelayotgan trafikni to‘liq to‘xtating

portManagement.title: Portlarni boshqarish
portManagement.content: Hujum yuzasini kamaytirish uchun foydalanilmayotgan portlarni yoping; masalan, SSH kerak bo‘lmasa 22-portni o‘chiring

cmcEmail.title: Email oqimini vizuallashtiruvchi CMC
cmcEmail.content: CMC boshqa xavfsizlik tizimlari bilan birgalikda ishlaydi va qo‘shilgan korporativ foydalanuvchilar uchun email oqimlarini kuzatish imkonini beradi

dynamicVulnerability.title: Dinamik zaifliklarni qidirish
dynamicVulnerability.content: Sun’iy intellekt tizimi yordamida sayt bilan bevosita o‘zaro ta’sir qilib zaifliklarni aniqlaydi

codeAnalyzer.title: Kod tahlilchisi
codeAnalyzer.content: VS Code plaginidan foydalanib, kod bazasidagi xavfsizlik muammolarini oldindan aniqlaydi va tuzatishga yordam beradi

intelligenceReport.title: Razvedka hisoboti
intelligenceReport.content: Maqsadingiz haqidagi ochiq portlar, ishlayotgan xizmatlar, subdomenlar va choralar talab qiluvchi boshqa sezgir ma’lumotlar bilan batafsil hisobot tuzadi

fullVulnerability.title: TO‘LIQ zaiflik tekshiruvi
fullVulnerability.content: To‘liq tekshiruv dinamik skanerlash va kod bazasini skanerlashni o‘z ichiga oladi

globalShield.title: Web xavfsizligi va trafik boshqaruvi
globalShield.button: Web ilovalar va API-larni himoya qiling

features.webProtection: Biznes mantiqi ekspluatatsiyasidan tashqari barcha web hujumlardan himoya

emailProtector.title: Email xavfsizligi
emailProtector.description:
Kuniga 10 tagacha email
Qo‘shimcha email: har biri $0.035

features.cmcEmail: CMC ichida eng ilg‘or email oqim vizualizatori
features.visibility: CMCda barcha hisoblarning yuborilgan va olingan emaillariga to‘liq ko‘rinish, avtomatik xavf toifalash bilan

securityTester.title: Zaifliklarni aniqlash
securityTester.description:
Oyiga 50 TAGACHA TO‘LIQ tekshiruv
Qo‘shimcha to‘liq tekshiruv: har biri $0.5

solution.sectionSubtitle: 4 daqiqada tayyor va kiberxavfsizlik bo‘yicha tajribasiz ham har qanday IT mutaxassisi foydalana oladi. Biz ilg‘or vizualizatsiya va maqbul narxni taklif qilamiz.

globalShield.title: Global Shield - CIA darajasidagi trafik monitoringi
globalShield.description: Interaktiv 3D globusimiz web trafikni yorqin tarzda namoyish etadi: sekundiga so‘rovlar, faol foydalanuvchilar va hajm (baytlarda).

bullets.one: Oddiy sozlash: IP va domeningizni ko‘rsating.
bullets.two: DNS ga qo‘shish uchun agent IP olasiz.
bullets.three: Ekspozitsiyani nolga tushirish uchun portlarni yoping.

emailProtector.title: Email Protector - dunyodagi birinchi AI email himoyasi
emailProtector.description: AI asosidagi birinchi tijoriy email himoya tizimi. Vektorli ko‘rinish email oqimini vaqt bo‘yicha kuzatishni va xavflarni aniqlashni osonlashtiradi.

bullets.one: Spoofing, spam, fishing va malware-ni aniqlaydi.
bullets.two: Administratorlar himoya qilish uchun email hisoblarini qo‘shishlari mumkin.
bullets.three: Eng ilg‘or tijorat email oqim vizualizatori.

securityTester.title: Security Tester - navbatdagi avlod zaiflik testi
securityTester.description: Tizim to‘liq xavfsizlik tekshiruvlari uchun bir martalik token (OTT) taqdim etadi. Browser yoki VS Code kengaytmasi orqali ulaning.

bullets.one: CMCda xavfsizlik doirasini va maqsadini belgilang.

cmc.title: Markazlashtirilgan boshqaruv konsoli (CMC)
cmc.description: Uchala komponent yagona konsol orqali boshqariladi, bu markazlashgan vizualizatsiya, sodda konfiguratsiya va monitoring, shuningdek keng qamrovli xavfsizlik hisobotlarini taqdim etadi.

items.title: 39 soniya
items.description: Har 39 soniyada bir marta xaker hujumi sodir bo‘ladi

items.title: 20 mln DDoS hujumi
items.description: Faqat 2025 yilning birinchi choragida 20,5 mln DDoS hujumi qayd etildi

items.title: Har kuni
items.description: Har kuni 30 000 ta sayt buzib kiriladi

floatingText.headline: Hakerlar qanday o‘ylashini kashf eting
floatingText.description: Haqiqiy hujum usullari va kiber tahdidlar bo‘yicha kundalik tadqiqotlarimizni kuzating

modal.title: Faol ishlab chiqilmoqda
modal.body: The system is expected to be launched on October 10

webSecurity.title: Web xavfsizlik tizimi: sayt/API 2 daqiqada ulanishi mumkin
webSecurity.description: DDoS, SQLi va boshqa web hujumlardan himoya. Portlarni yopish imkoniyati ham bor; 22-port ishlatilmaganda uni yopish yaxshi amaliyot

ciaMonitoring.title: CIA darajasidagi trafik monitoringi
ciaMonitoring.description: Interaktiv 3D globus so‘rovlar, foydalanuvchilar va hajm bo‘yicha trafikni ko‘rsatadi, foydalanuvchilar soni o‘zgarish tarixini kuzatish imkonini beradi

userGrowth.title: Foydalanuvchi o‘sishi bo‘yicha foydali ma’lumotlar
userGrowth.description: Foydalanuvchilar soni o‘zgarishi tarixini ko‘rish imkoniyati

aiEmailProtection.title: Dunyodagi birinchi AI email himoya tizimi: email tarmog‘i 2 daqiqada ulanadi
aiEmailProtection.description: Administratorlar qo‘shgan hisoblar uchun CMC yuborilgan va qabul qilingan barcha emaillarni to‘liq ko‘rsatadi, spoofing, spam, fishing, xavfli havola va malware kabi tahdidlarni avtomatik tasniflaydi.

emailVisualization.title: Yuborilgan va qabul qilingan email vizualizatsiyasi
emailVisualization.description: CMCdagi eng ilg‘or tijorat email oqim vizualizatori

secureWebmail.title: Xavfsiz webmail mijoz
secureWebmail.description: Administrator qo‘shgan hisoblar uchun spoofing, spam, fishing va malware-ni aniqlaydigan eng xavfsiz webmail mijoz

footer.addressValue: Media City Free Zone, Al Messaned, Sharjah, UAE

hero.title: Build systems with secure and private code
hero.description: Private development environment for enterprises, where code never leaves your corporate network. Meanwhile offering the latest AI-powered technology

components.title: Everything stays inside
components.subtitle: Three components, one sealed loop
components.description: Code, prompts, and builds never leave your network. SLNC Code keeps AI help, reviews, and delivery private for cloud providers, government teams, and industrial plants.

incident.title: Critical incident — leaked code
incident.heading: DeepSeek breach put source and prompts on the open internet
incident.description: Keep inference and scanning on-prem. No external model egress. Audit trails by default.

quality.title: Automatic code quality
quality.description: Structure, style, and best-practice checks tuned for safety-critical code

vulnerability.title: Vulnerability sweeps
vulnerability.description: SQLi, XSS, auth bypass, and insecure dependencies surfaced instantly

secrets.title: Secrets guard
secrets.description: Keys, tokens, and credentials blocked at commit time

config.title: Config hardening
config.description: Docker/K8s, IAM, and network policies scanned for privilege creep

beyondCodeQL.title: Finds what static queries miss
beyondCodeQL.subtitle: Beyond CodeQL
beyondCodeQL.description: Finds misconfigs and vulnerable packages faster than CodeQL and offers fixes, not just alerts.

points.packages: Knows package graphs and flags risky dependencies in seconds.
points.config: Spots config drift and privilege creep—beyond static rules.
points.patches: Each finding comes with a suggested patch and owner.

visualizer.title: Code analyzer in action
visualizer.subtitle: Visualizer
visualizer.description: Crisp snapshots from recent scans, rendered beautifully inside the on-prem console.

scanOverview.title: Scan overview
scanOverview.description: See issues grouped by severity before code leaves your network.

misconfigurations.title: Detection of misconfigurations
misconfigurations.description: Our AI-powered code analyzer even finds misconfigurations within the code.

inlineDiffs.title: Inline diffs
inlineDiffs.description: Review suggested patches inline with security context.
